name: Clear Water – a Spring of Life
generalDescription: The commemorative coins are dedicated to one of the basics of life on Earth – Water. Their role is to attract attention of society to careful attitude towards the natural resources, in particular rivers, lakes, and seas.
averseDescription: On the obverse of both coins in the inner circle there are ripples dispersing from a drop on the water surface, above – one drop more. In the outer circle there are the Small National Emblem of Ukraine to the left and the coin issue year: 2007 to the right, the circumferential legends: НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ БАНК УКРАЇНИ (National Bank of Ukraine) above; there is the denomination: 20 ГРИВЕНЬ (20 hryvnias) on the precious metal coin, 5 ГРИВЕНЬ (5 hryvnias) on the non-precious metal coin below, as well as the logotype of the National Bank of Ukraine Mint.
reverseDescription: On the reverse of both coins in the inner circle there is the symbolic composition – a man and waterfall are depicted. In the outer circle there is the circumferential legend ЧИСТА ВОДА – ДЖЕРЕЛО ЖИТТЯ (Clean water – the source of life).
